modName: Art of the Catch - CCOR Patch
summary:
Simple .esp replacer that support complete crafting overhaul.
Hide and show the fishing rod introduced by Art of the Catch by chesko.
descriptionHtml:
Simple .esp replacer that make Art of the Catch fully usable with complete crafting overhaul remade.
Hide and show the fishing rod introduced by Art of the Catch by chesko.

INSTALL
Copy the data folder in the Skyrim directory.
Check the mod in Skyrim Launcher, Wrye Bash, etc...

UNINSTALL
Delete the esp file.

ISSUE and PROBLEMS
Please, send PM.

CREDITS
Chesko - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65613/?tab=14&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodbugs%2F%3Fid%3D65613&pUp=1]Art of the Catch
[/url]
author: Shruikan
